localizedMeta.description:
MTG: LifeKeeper

- Set life points from a minimum of 10 to a maximum of 100 points! (Default 20)
- Ability to set names above life point scores.
- Both sides have the ability to select their own elemental background.

Package size: 13 MB - More storage space required for install

Compatibility information:
Number of players for local play: 1-2 Players

Supported interfaces/sensors
- Touchscreen

Supported languages:
English(United States)

WorldGenesis
